snippet.title: Digimon World Next Order First Teaser 1080p (Digimon Game 2015 PS Vita)
snippet.description:
Bandai Namco recently announced a new Digimon game for the PlayStation Vita with Digimon World: Next Order, and its first trailer shows us a little bit of its gameplay.

While gameplay details are still light for the time being, the video shows us a little bit of the protagonist and his Digimon buddies in Agumon and Gabumon by his side. You can read more about them in our earlier report.

Digimon World: Next Order will  be about an “evolving world,” where you’ll get to travel alongside your Digimon partners.

Digimon World: Next Order will release in Japan sometime in 2016 for PlayStation Vita.
